chinese: 交通是许多城市空气污染的主要原因。
english: Traffic is the main cause of air pollution in many cities.

chinese: 了解如何使用图书馆将节省你的时间。
english: Understanding how to use the library will save your time.

chinese: 植物是能够在陆地或水中生长的生物。
english: Plants are the living things that can grow in land or in water.

chinese: 当地野生动物的困境已被开发者忽视。
english: The plight of local wildlife has been ignored by developers.

chinese: 大学剧团将在音乐厅演出。
english: The university theater group will be performing in the concert hall.

chinese: 与保守派政治家并驾齐驱的艺术家们获得了评论家的角色。
english: The artists tied with the conservative politicians earned the roles of critics.

chinese: 考古学家的新发现在以前被忽视的基础上脱颖而出。
english: The archaeologist's new discoveries stand out in previously overlooked foundations.

chinese: 大多数科学家认为气候变化威胁着地球上的生命。
english: Most scientists believe that climate change threatens lives on the earth.

chinese: 这并不意味着问题容易解决。
english: It may not mean that it is possible to solve the problem easily.

chinese: 如果你需要额外帮助，请访问学生资源中心。
english: If you need additional help, visit the student resource center.
